name: Z Escape
description:
It’s time to rescue your beloved citizens from invaders! Will you be up for the challenges ?

Jump at the back of your helicopter, get rid of all the enemies along the way and cover as many citizens as you can!

But you won’t be able to save everyone so you might use your environment to clean the path and save them all… Are you prepared for that? There is only one way to find out!

Here is a list the features of your new free casual game:
-Beautiful 3D graphics
-The most important number of invader hordes displayed on a smartphone
-100% free game
-Fun and addictive gameplay
-Easy controls
-For kids and adults
-Many worlds to discover

Best of luck in this life changing action game! And remember, everyone counts on you so do not disappoint. Many lives are in your hands now, you are the new hero…
